main event: A witness observed a light in the sky moving rapidly at a 45-degree elevation on September 13, 1964.
interesting points: The observation lasted about 6 seconds., The light moved southerly and changed position by 3 degrees on the horizon., The witness reported that the object disappeared slowly, fading from view., The object was described as blue-gray., There were no photographs present with the report.
witness description: details not fully provided in the report
